channel.title: Anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme?
channel.description: Has anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme? I am wondering if anyone has a good recommendation of a provider to go with.

item.title: Anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme?

item.description:
Thanks for the help and sorry for the slow reply (I went on hols ) All input much appreciated. Will hopefully get this sorted this side of Christmas. The joys of running your own business!

item.title: Anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme?

item.description:
IIRC my company also paid me in childcare vouchers without using any third party. It was a while ago, so I forget the details.

item.source: Anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme?

item.title: Anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme?
item.dc:creator: Melanie_Burke
item.description:
Hi there,

You don’t necessarily need to use a scheme. We set it up so our company provide it and pays directly to our childcare provider (as advised by our accountant). If it’s only you using the scheme then you don’t need a provider to run it.

MoneySavingExpert.com

Childcare vouchers: save £1,000/year - MoneySavingExpert

If you pay for childcare, the government's childcare vouchers scheme saves many parents £1000s a year in tax - find out more with Money Saving Expert.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme?

item.description:
robinwarren:

Has anyone in the UK signed up to a childcare voucher scheme? I am wondering if anyone has a good recommendation of a provider to go with.

Where do you live? We use https://www.efcvouchers.com/ in Northern Ireland.
